taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section hispidi;species paganus;

treatment.description: Primocanes slender, closely covered with glands and crowded fine bristles 3 or 4 mm. long; primocane-leaves mostly 5-foliolate, soft-pubescent beneath, 5-7 cm. long; terminal leaflet rhombic-obovate, acuminate, on a very short (4-5 mm.) petiolule; flowering shoots with larger leaves, these extending well into the corymb; axis and pedicels spiculose; calyx very glandular.
